name: VideoWave 3D Movie Project File
summary: Learn about .DMSM3D files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DMSM3D projects can be exported to several video formats, including .AVI, .3GP, .WMV, .MP2, and .MP4. They may also be exported to iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, and Sony PSP video formats.
NOTE: VideoWave projects more commonly use the .DMSM extension.

description: Media production file created by VideoWave, a movie editor included with the Roxio Creator software; stores a movie production, which can include movie clips, transitions, effects, audio, and slide show photos; used for saving and loading video editing progress.
